story-telling.title: BOLD STORYTELLING AT THE INTERSECTION OF SPORTS, EMOTION, AND ART
story-telling.text: Mathis Lenorais is the creative mind behind Clere Visuals, capturing sports and movement through photography and art. Not fast enough to compete at the professional level, he channels his energy into freezing emotions, intensity, and fleeting moments in every shot. With a passion for dynamic visual storytelling, he transforms moments into images that inspire, move, and leave a lasting impression.

connect.collab-1: If you have a collaboration in mind, don't hesitate
connect.collab-2: to reach out to me via emails with the details!
connect.follow: You can also follow my work on

about.bio-1: I focus on sport in its purest form, with a strong emphasis on track & field and high-performance environments. My photography explores effort, discipline, and precision, capturing athletes in moments where intensity meets control.
about.bio-2: I pay close attention to movement, rhythm, and the structure of the track. Timing, light, and posture are at the core of my work, showing the reality of effort and performance.
